exterior.confident: With its confident shape, the design naturally draws attention.
exterior.strongPresence: A Strong Presence, Built to Inspire Confidence
exterior.description1: The Leapmotor C10 merges technological innovation with natural elegance. Its balanced front design with LED auto headlights creates a confident, modern signature, while the trident hub wheels add sportiness and power.
exterior.description2: From the side, three sculpted waist lines emphasize motion and harmony, giving the profile a sleek, purposeful look. At the rear, the airfoil-style spoiler enhances aerodynamics and reinforces the sporty yet elegant aesthetic.
exterior.description3: A design where beauty meets power — striking to look at, advanced to drive.
exterior.ledDesc: Their futuristic design integrates seamlessly into the vehicle's aerodynamic profile, combining functionality with a modern aesthetic.
exterior.flushDesc: Seamlessly integrated into the body, hidden door handles enhance the modern design and improve aerodynamic efficiency.
exterior.wiperDesc: The hidden rear wiper maintains a clean silhouette, improves aerodynamics, and ensures clear visibility in all weather.
exterior.wheelsDesc: Bold 20" alloy sporty wheels for performance or the sleek 18" double five-spoke wheels for lightweight efficiency.

home.bannerSubheading: The new generation of electric vehicles.

c10.heading: C10
c10.subheading: 100% Electric | Hybrid EV | All Wheel Drive
c10.discoverSubheading: Electric or extended range, for every journey.

interiorComponent.ambientLightDesc: Creates a sophisticated atmosphere with customizable ambient lighting throughout the interior.
interiorComponent.chargerDesc: Advanced fast charging technology allows you to charge efficiently and reduce charging time significantly.
interiorComponent.consoleDesc: Intelligently designed central console with intuitive controls and storage for modern convenience.
interiorComponent.storageDesc: Optimized storage compartments throughout the cabin provide ample space for all your essentials.
